selected_skills.name: identify_sequence_pattern
selected_skills.purpose: To analyze the sequence or pattern in the images and identify the correct image that fits the pattern.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to determine the pattern or sequence rule from the given images and identify the missing picture.

selected_skills.name: map_angle_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the identified correct image to one of the option labels.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to map the identified correct image to the corresponding option label (A, B, C, D, E, F).
